name: Ballistic Mini Golf
description: Ballistic Mini Golf is a futuristic mini golf game set in a Sci-fi universe with hundreds of challenging holes, advanced ball customization and single-player / multi-player game modes for up to 4 players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, AMD Radeon 4850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or better, AMD Radeon 7950 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
